settings.heading: All scents notes
settings.content:
Begin, Beloved (Oriental/woody)

  • TOP: Cypress, Lemon Peel, Mint, Camphor, Sage
  • Middle:Evergreen, Eucalyptus, Orange Blossom, Violet, Lavender
  • Base:Fir, Moss, Patchouli, Incense, Powder

AMBER VOWS (Amber/Woody)

  • Top: Palm,Cardamom,Vanilla Sugar
  • Heart: Jasmine,Vanilla Orchid, Tonka Bean, Oak, Patchouli
  • Base: Amber & Musk, Cedarwood & Vetiver, Creamy Vanilla, Powder

RESET (Spicy/Smoky)

  • Top: Lemon, Citrus, Cardamom, Black Pepper
  • Middle: Ginger, Palo Santo & Violet, Saffron, Leather
  • Base: Smoked Amber, Wood & Sandalwood

T. T. Y (Oriental/Foug√®re)

  • Top: Sea Salt, Honeydew, Melon, Sage, Orange, Grapefruit, Coriander
  • Middle: Violet, Fig, Orris, Lavender, Amuris
  • Base: Cedar, Moss, Oakmoss, Sandalwood, Amber, Dark Musk

settings.heading: Scented Candle Details
settings.content:
• High temperature resistant ceramic material, for use for our refills only
  • Ceramic vessel size: 3.14 inch(H) X 3.14 inch(W)
  • Net weight: 8OZ(225g)
  • Burn time: 55-60 hours
  • Wax: Natural coconut&Vegetable wax. FREE from parabens, phthalates, toxins, and carcinogens.
  • Ingredients: Premium, non-toxic fragrance oil certified by U.S. standards.

settings.heading: Candle Refills Details
settings.content:
• Weight:8oz(226g)
  • Burn time: 55-60 hours
  • Made with a natural soy&vegetable wax. FREE from parabens, phthalates, toxins, and carcinogens. Plus, vegan-friendly.
  • Ingredients: Premium, non-toxic fragrance oil certified by U.S. standards.
  • Scented candle refills compared to our ceramic vessel only.

settings.heading: Shipping&Return Policy
settings.content: Free shipping for orders more than $80. Please click the Return&Refund Policy to know more details.

settings.collapsible_title: Light once. Refill always. A thoughtful choice for first-timers.
